pageContext.title: Responsive Banner Section (PRO)
pageContext.miniDescription: Banner Section that allows you to use an image for mobile devices and, optionally, a  different one on desktop.
pageContext.description:
Responsive banner Shopify section coded by a certified Shopify partner.


It works out of the box with any theme with sections and allows you to:


✓ add a link to redirect on click

✓ open link on new tab or same page

✓ use an image for desktop and a different one for mobile devices

✓ controllable top margin/spacing

✓ controllable top margin/spacing


Installation takes 30 seconds. You can find detailed instructions clicking here.
